Text: Thank you so much!!! By the way, would you please tell me which source you used, from which country come your DVDs? because in Belgium and the Netherlands, where they speak Dutch, these dvds aren't released. Which dvds did you use?
No problem :) And I'm from The Netherlands (but let's continue speaking English), but I ordered the DVD's at Amazon.de. And so I will with part 5-8 ;)
hahaha im from the netherlands too and i wanted to thank you because the first 3 parts will be finishing today. And i also wanted to say that parts 5 and 6 came out today.
Exactly what I wanted to say too, you cn buy them on amazon.de too.
Actually, those parts are released on june 24. You can pre-order them, and then they will be delivered on the 24th, or 25th.
Oops, sorry, my mistake. :D I often forget to read the important bits. :D
And are you going to get those too?
Yes, he already said so in another comment he posted on another torrent.
@Jordyep: Yes I will. Once I get my salary, I will buy part 5 and 6, and will upload them as soon as posible ;)
Thank you SO much :) Are you able to get them on the internet before 3th of july? because im going on holiday then. BTW; THANK YOU SO MUCH, the quality is AMAZING :)
THANK you so much the quality is amazing. Are you able to get them on the internet before 3th of july, because i will go on holiday then?

Dear Virtual World,
Thank you so much for giving yourself and volunteering your efforts, determination, energy, heart, expertise in uploading the Harry Potter Extras. It means so much to us all...(The Harry Potter generation that is!)... with Post potter depression being at the peak. Looking forward to the rest of the Extras. Take care and God Bless.
